posts.title: End the H1B program
posts.content:
I think the H1-B program needs to end entirely.

WHY

The Program was created during the Y2K era for TEMPORARY relief as companies weren't finding enough people to work on Y2K as a rush job. But ofcourse, they kept it open and increased it to 200K entrants a year - I think its now at 65K which is still a huge number.

Why hasn't any assessment been done since then to gauge whether there still is a shortage?

Because these multi-national-companies like Accenture, PWC, Wipro, Infosys etc. BRIBE the scumbag lawmakers and company executives and use that as leverage to keep the gravy train flowing.

In the middle are these companies and hundreds of useless middle-men raking in profits, taking most of the H1B worker's compensation;

Even the H1B workers hate these middlemen.

HOW THEY PROVE THERE IS NO US TALENT FOR JOBS

Enter the scumbag lawyers and how the law is raped. The law states that you place an ad for 6 months with the job description to prove there are no US citizens QUALIFIED enough to take the job.

So what do the companies do? They create BLOATED job descriptions with a shit-ton of tech stacks; You need to know C++, Java, Kafka, AWS, and Go-Lang, Reactive Programming, NOSQL, SQL, RABBITMQ, Big Data,and EMR. Min Degree requirement is stil BS or equivalent.

So when US citizens apply for this job, and are missing one of these -say Go-Lang, they'll get REJECTED. Never mind it takes any developer with 2 years of experience to pick up new languages within 2-3 months and become good at it.

If by some miracle you do pass through the resume screen and get interviews, some assholes will set up 6 rounds of 1 hour interviews giving you every puzzle known to humankind to fuck you up and make you feel worthless.

Finally now that they've proven there are NO US citizens QUALIFIED for that position, they will now pat Accenture on the back and tell them "Its yours. Fill the spot for us".

Accenture will get Mr Srinivasan Chelamurthy from Hyderabad with a nickname of Sri to push in a FAKE resume with EVERY technology mastered. And will use an internal rat in the company's interview team to certify Sri knows his shit EXTREMELY well..and will be an ABSOLUTE fit.

Sri's bill rate will be set to $120/hr. Out of this, Accenture will take $30/hr; And some scumbag executive at the company who made this shit deal happen will take $20-$30/hr. Leaving Sri to work out the equation of living in the Bay Area with $60-$70/hr - equating to $120K - $140K total, $6-7K per month after taxes etc.

Which makes Sri live in a duplex with 3 other families to make ends meet.

A SOLUTION

Keep the universities open to accept limited foreign students with merit, and give them a path to citizenship if they achieve a good GPA + recommendation from faculty. THAT should be the policy, Full-Stop. All other employment - even if you need "Talent" for a short while - should be TEMPORARY with no path to a GC + Citizenship.

Rest, we don't really need 65-200K rejects from other countries to fill up US employment. Yes, the people who can't secure great spots in these 3rd world countries take up jobs with these body-shopping IT middlemen to find a job in the US. The thought we're getting the best of the best is just a myth. Every 3rd world country is wise to how the US works, and the best of the best would rather work for GOOGLE/FB/Amazon in their own country and not move unless they're offered positions via Google/FB/Amazon directly.

The Complaint that will come from Companies

Oh, but we're based out of Kansas City. Or Montana. Or Minnesota. It is IMPOSSIBLE to find 200 IT engineers in my city. We are HEAVILY WORKED. and NONE of the folks working in California/New York/Texas want to MOVE. Therefore we NEED some code-monkeys in shithole countries to pack their bags and MOVE to Kansas City so they can WORK for us..

SOLUTION

Tell the fucktards to change their positions to REMOTE positions; No reason why that can't work, since thats how we worked 2020-2023. FUCK YOU. Employ Americans, and WORK REMOTE.

No need for a code-monkey to be shipped across to you so your State Govt can get assured DEMOCRAT votes from them.

I think the H1-B program needs to end entirely. 

**WHY**


The Program was created during the Y2K era for TEMPORARY relief as companies weren't finding enough people to work on Y2K as a rush job. But ofcourse, they kept it open and increased it to 200K entrants a year - I think its now at 65K which is still a huge number. 

Why hasn't any assessment been done since then to gauge whether there still is a shortage?

Because these multi-national-companies like Accenture, PWC, Wipro, Infosys etc. BRIBE the scumbag lawmakers and company executives and use that as leverage to keep the gravy train flowing. 

In the middle are these companies and hundreds of useless middle-men raking in profits, taking most of the H1B worker's compensation; 

Even the H1B workers hate these middlemen.

Enter the scumbag lawyers and how the law is raped. The law states that you place an ad for 6 months with the job description to prove there are no US citizens QUALIFIED enough to take the job.

So what do the companies do? They create BLOATED job descriptions with a shit-ton of tech stacks; You need to know C++, Java, Kafka, AWS, and Go-Lang, Reactive Programming, NOSQL, SQL, RABBITMQ, Big Data,and EMR. Min Degree requirement is stil BS or equivalent. 

So when US citizens apply for this job, and are missing one of these -say Go-Lang, they'll get REJECTED. Never mind it takes any developer with 2 years of experience to pick up new languages within 2-3 months and become good at it. 

If by some miracle you do pass through the resume screen and get interviews, some assholes will set up 6 rounds of 1 hour interviews giving you every puzzle known to humankind to fuck you up and make you feel worthless.

Finally now that they've proven there are NO US citizens QUALIFIED for that position, they will now pat Accenture on the back and tell them "Its yours. Fill the spot for us".

Accenture will get Mr Srinivasan Chelamurthy from Hyderabad with a nickname of Sri to push in a FAKE resume with EVERY technology mastered. And will use an internal rat in the company's interview team to certify Sri knows his shit EXTREMELY well..and will be an ABSOLUTE fit. 

Sri's bill rate will be set to $120/hr. Out of this, Accenture will take $30/hr; And some scumbag executive at the company who made this shit deal happen will take $20-$30/hr. Leaving Sri to work out the equation of living in the Bay Area with $60-$70/hr - equating to $120K - $140K total, $6-7K per month after taxes etc. 

Which makes Sri live in a duplex with 3 other families to make ends meet.

Keep the universities open to accept limited foreign students with merit, and give them a path to citizenship if they achieve a good GPA + recommendation from faculty. THAT should be the policy, Full-Stop. All other employment - even if you need "Talent" for a short while - should be TEMPORARY with no path to a GC + Citizenship. 

Rest, we don't really need 65-200K rejects from other countries to fill up US employment. Yes, the people who can't secure great spots in these 3rd world countries take up jobs with these body-shopping IT middlemen to find a job in the US. The thought we're getting the best of the best is just a myth. Every 3rd world country is wise to how the US works, and the best of the best would rather work for GOOGLE/FB/Amazon in their own country and not move unless they're offered positions via Google/FB/Amazon directly.

**The Complaint that will come from Companies**


Oh, but we're based out of Kansas City. Or Montana. Or Minnesota. It is IMPOSSIBLE to find 200 IT engineers in my city. We are HEAVILY WORKED. and NONE of the folks working in California/New York/Texas want to MOVE. Therefore we NEED some code-monkeys in shithole countries to pack their bags and MOVE to Kansas City so they can WORK for us..

**SOLUTION**

Tell the fucktards to change their positions to REMOTE positions; No reason why that can't work, since thats how we worked 2020-2023. FUCK YOU. Employ Americans, and WORK REMOTE. 

No need for a code-monkey to be shipped across to you so your State Govt can get assured DEMOCRAT votes from them.

This may reduce the Republican majority in the US House to a razor thin 220-215.
